titles.title: New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2006
A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a study of water resources in the States of New Mexico.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/18/2006--Introduced. New Mexico Aquifer Assessment Act of 2006 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior, acting through the Director of the United States Geological Survey (USGS), to conduct a study of water resources in New Mexico, to include: (1) a survey of groundwater resources and a characterization of surface and bedrock geology; and (2) the Estancia Basin, Salt Basin, Tularosa Basin, Hueco Basin, and middle Rio Grande Basin.
